title: Question About a Specific Tuition Fee
description: A student is inquiring about a 'Student Activity Fee' listed on their tuition bill.

tasks.description: Identify the student and view their itemized tuition bill.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the 'Student Activity Fee' on the bill.

tasks.description: Look up the definition and purpose of the fee in the university's fee schedule documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the fee supports student clubs, events, and government.

tasks.description: Clearly explain the purpose of the fee to the student.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear and concise explanation.
